channel.title: Player can't log in (PLEASE HELP)
channel.description:
This randomly started happening, my players can connect and everything, but once the connection get's accepted the server just freezes and does nothing.
I really need help!!! Pic: [img]http://i326.photobucket.com/albums/k421/lesterknome/untitled-2.jpg[/img] It stops when it's making accounts, players that already have an account can get on fine, but it stops after what is shown EDIT: No New accounts can be made!!?!!?!
